properties.name: tsm.sticky
properties.description: Whether sessions are configured to be sticky. More information at https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast-tomcat-sessionmanager#sticky-sessions-and-tomcat.

properties.name: tsm.hazelcast.instance.name
properties.description: Name of the Hazelcast instance used to store session data.

properties.name: tsm.map.name
properties.description: Name of the Hazelcast map used to store session data.

properties.name: tsm.deferred.write
properties.description: Whether writes to the cluster are cached. More information at https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast-tomcat-sessionmanager#controlling-session-caching-with-deferredWrite.

properties.name: tsm.config.location
properties.description: Location of the Hazelcast configuration file location.

properties.name: tsm.autoconfig.enabled
properties.description: Set to false to disable auto-configuration.

properties.name: tsm.process.expires.frequency
properties.description: Frequency of the session expiration, and related manager operations. More information at https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-9.0-doc/config/cluster-manager.html#Common_Attributes.
